/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. A few clouds are scattered across the sky, adding depth to the image. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, reflecting the natural and urban elements of the scene.
